alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 4:55PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph, increasing west 25 to 35 mph with occasional gusts to 55 mph early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous cross winds are expected on north to south oriented roadways and will be especially dangerous for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.
